headline: Why Arista Networks Stock Rocketed Higher This Week
summary: An analyst upgraded his recommendation on the tech company.  After all, according to data compiled by S&P Global Market Intelligence, the company's shares saw a more than 16% surge in price over the week.  This occurred largely because of an analyst recommendation change for the better.
